## Client.updateCollection() method

updateCollection updates an existing collection. Currenrly, updates can include name and schema.  Allow update of indexing information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateCollection(threadID: ThreadID, name: string, schema: any, indexes?: pb.Index.AsObject[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  threadID | ThreadID | the ID of the database |
|  name | string | The human-readable name for the collection. |
|  schema | any |  |
|  indexes | pb.Index.AsObject\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
